title: Pyramid
description: An employee directory that allows the user to filter and sort their employee information.

title: Gitworkd
description: A platform for hosting and exploring open source projects on GitHub. Users are able to upload/save/view repositories.

title: Pitch
description: An application that allows the user to explore, log, and view information on musical artists.

title: Raviga
description: A fitness tracker application used to log and track workouts in order for the user to reach fitness goals.

title: BurgerBase
description: An application used to log your favorite burgers! Submit a burger, and then devour it!

title: ClearSky
description: A weather dashboard application that display the current weather of a city and it's 5 day forecast.
